document.full_text: a 91-year-old california woman selling do-it-yourself asphyxiation kits for $60 apiece says business is booming since a depressed but otherwise healthy young man used her product to kill himself in oregon.
document.title: 91-year-old stands by "exit kits" despite suicide furor
lines_and_colors: a 91-year-old california woman selling do-it-yourself asphyxiation kits for $60 apiece says business is booming since a depressed but otherwise healthy young man used her product to kill himself in oregon.
